name: Barnaby and the Tower Walls
description:
Download the file, extract, and run the GameStudio2020.exe

The young apprentice, Barnaby, causes an accident which traps his master in a bottle. He must scale the tower to save him!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump (hold for a higher jump)

Click to create magic!

Use hotkeys or the mousewheel to change spells.

1 - Cloud (click and drag)

2 - Shooting Stars

3 - Vortex Wheel

Can you reach floor 21 in time? Good luck!
